verses.kjv: And I turned, and lifted up mine eyes, and looked, and, behold, there came four chariots out from between two mountains; and the mountains were mountains of brass.
verses.ct: I looked up again and saw 4 chariots coming out from between 2 mountains, and the mountains were made of bronze.

verses.kjv: In the first chariot were red horses; and in the second chariot black horses;
verses.ct: The first chariot was pulled by red horses, and the second chariot by black horses.

verses.kjv: And in the third chariot white horses; and in the fourth chariot grisled and bay horses.
verses.ct: The third chariot had white horses, and the fourth chariot had spotted and strong horses.

verses.kjv: Then I answered and said unto the angel that talked with me, What are these, my lord?
verses.ct: I asked the angel who had been speaking with me, "What are these, my lord?"

verses.kjv: And the angel answered and said unto me, These are the four spirits of the heavens, which go forth from standing before the LORD of all the earth.
verses.ct: The angel replied, "These are the 4 spirits of the heavens, going out after standing in the presence of the Lord of the whole earth."

verses.kjv: The black horses which are therein go forth into the north country; and the white go forth after them; and the grisled go forth toward the south country.
verses.ct: "The chariot with the black horses is heading toward the northern land, the white ones follow after them, and the spotted ones are heading toward the southern land."

verses.kjv: And the bay went forth, and sought to go that they might walk to and fro through the earth: and he said, Get you hence, walk to and fro through the earth. So they walked to and fro through the earth.
verses.ct: The strong horses went out, eager to patrol across the earth. He said, "Go, patrol throughout the earth." So they roamed throughout the earth.

verses.kjv: Then cried he upon me, and spake unto me, saying, Behold, these that go toward the north country have quieted my spirit in the north country.
verses.ct: Then he called out to me and said, "Look — the ones going toward the northern land have put my spirit at rest regarding the northern land."

verses.kjv: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came to me, saying:

verses.kjv: Take of them of the captivity, even of Heldai, of Tobijah, and of Jedaiah, which are come from Babylon, and come thou the same day, and go into the house of Josiah the son of Zephaniah;
verses.ct: "Collect offerings from the exiles — from Heldai, Tobijah, and Jedaiah, who have arrived from Babylon. That same day, go to the house of Josiah son of Zephaniah.

verses.kjv: Then take silver and gold, and make crowns, and set them upon the head of Joshua the son of Josedech, the high priest;
verses.ct: Take the silver and gold, fashion them into a crown, and place it on the head of Joshua son of Josedech, the high priest.

verses.kjv: And speak unto him, saying, Thus speaketh the LORD of hosts, saying, Behold the man whose name is The BRANCH; and he shall grow up out of his place, and he shall build the temple of the LORD:
verses.ct: Tell him this: The LORD of hosts says, 'Here is the man called The BRANCH. He will sprout up from where he is, and he will build the temple of the LORD.

verses.kjv: Even he shall build the temple of the LORD; and he shall bear the glory, and shall sit and rule upon his throne; and he shall be a priest upon his throne: and the counsel of peace shall be between them both.
verses.ct: Yes, he is the one who will build the temple of the LORD. He will carry the glory, and he will sit on his throne and rule. He will also serve as a priest on his throne, and there will be perfect harmony between the two roles.'

verses.kjv: And the crowns shall be to Helem, and to Tobijah, and to Jedaiah, and to Hen the son of Zephaniah, for a memorial in the temple of the LORD.
verses.ct: The crown will be kept in the temple of the LORD as a reminder, in honor of Helem, Tobijah, Jedaiah, and Hen son of Zephaniah.

verses.kjv: And they that are far off shall come and build in the temple of the LORD, and ye shall know that the LORD of hosts hath sent me unto you. And this shall come to pass, if ye will diligently obey the voice of the LORD your God.
verses.ct: People from distant places will come and help build the temple of the LORD, and you will know that the LORD of hosts has sent me to you. This will happen if you faithfully obey the LORD your God."
